description:
Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria`s devious plan is revealed, and Luffy`s escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can`t live without!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Kinkyuujitai! Saikyou no Kage no Ikisaki
Luffy`s Emergency Situation! The Ultimate Shadow`s Destination!
Situation de crise pour Luffy ! Le devenir de la plus puissante des ombres !
Луффи в критической ситуации! Предназначение самой сильной тени!
ルフィ緊急事態! 最強の影の行き先!
